dct_title_s: Sauer's map of the city of Detroit and environs Michigan :a general map of Detroit and suburbs including the entire metropolitan area
dct_alternative_sm: Sauer's map of the city of Detroit and environs Michigan : a general map of Detroit and suburbs including the entire metropolitan area / compiled and drawn by Wm. Sauer.
dct_description_sm: Printed on face of map: "Compliments of American loan and trust company."
Includes index to public buildings and lists latest street changes.
dcat_keyword_sm: Streets Michigan Detroit Metropolitan Area Directories.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
